meanings.definition: To erase or delete text by pressing the backspace key on a keyboard.
meanings.sent1: She backspaced the typo in her email before sending it.
meanings.sent2: I backspaced the extra space between the words.
meanings.sent3: He backspaced so quickly, it was like magic!
meanings.sent4: The backspaced words vanished into thin air.
meanings.sent5: The backspaced text disappeared with a satisfying click.
